question: 1. Identify the imperative sentence.

options.option4: It has been raining since morning.

93. Give the correct Passive form of-'My teacher embodies all the good qualities.'
answer: All the good qualities are embodied in my teacher

options.option1: All the good qualities are embodied on my teacher
options.option2: All the good qualities are embodied by my teacher
options.option3: All the good qualities are embodied in my teacher
options.option4: All the good qualities are embodied to my teacher

question: 94. Choose the correct indirect speech- She asked me 'Are you happy in your new job?'
answer: She asked me if I was happy in my new job

options.option1: She asked me if I was happy in my new job
options.option2: She asked me if I have been happy in my new job
options.option3: She asked me whether I am happy in my new job
options.option4: She asked me if I had been happy in my new job
